lead_paragraph: The Mets, who have struggled at the plate, will visit Philadelphia and Cincinnati, two stadiums conducive to offensive production.
snippet: The Mets, who have struggled at the plate, will visit Philadelphia and Cincinnati, two stadiums conducive to offensive production.

headline.main: Mets Take Trip to Right Places to Find Their Bats
headline.seo: Mets Take Trip to Right Places to Find Their Bats
headline.print_headline: After Bullying Lesser Teams, Mets Beat Up One of the Best
